metadata.synopsis: Danis is a tiefling from the grove who is being held prisoner in Moonrise towers. In his initial dialogue he terrified and frantic and worried about his partner Bex (who the player may have met in last light inn). He is also a back up to get the escape quest if Lia and Lakrissa (two other tieflings) are dead.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Teleport to act 2 using the debug book, in act 2 setup choose the tiefling path. Then teleport to the moonrise dungeon - the tieflings will be there.

2.speaker: Danis
2.text: Something's happening. Please, don't leave me in here. Please!

8.speaker: Danis
8.text: I keep closing my eyes and praying I'll wake up somewhere else - anywhere else.
8.context: NodeContext: scared - hoping someone will save you

13.speaker: Danis
13.text: Something's happening. Please, don't leave me in here. Please!

15.speaker: Danis
15.text: Hold on - this thing is in knots.
15.context: NodeContext: tense and annoyed - player has interrupted him

18.speaker: Danis
18.text: All I wanted was a little house in Baldur's Gate with Bex. Not this. Not any of this.
18.context: NodeContext: scared - hoping someone will save you

20.speaker: Danis
20.text: All I wanted was a little house in Baldur's Gate with Bex. Not this. Not any of this.
20.context: NodeContext: scared - hoping someone will save you

26.speaker: Danis
26.text: Hey! You were in the grove, right?
26.context: NodeContext: Panicked, frantic - speaking through prison bars

11.speaker: Player
11.context: NodeContext: bex is the love of your life - terrified she's hurt or worse

77.speaker: Danis
77.text: Please - have you seen Bex? Dark hair, golden eyes - is she in another cell? Is she all right?
77.context: NodeContext: bex is the love of your life - terrified she's hurt or worse

23.speaker: Player
23.text: Shouldn't you be worrying about yourself?

25.speaker: Danis
25.text: Please, she must be here - in another cell or something.

58.speaker: Danis
58.text: When the necromancer comes for us, make him take me, all right? Just leave her alone - please.
58.context: NodeContext: he'd do anything to protect bex, including sacrificing himself

14.speaker: Player
14.context: NodeContext: frantic - horror dawning on him

27.speaker: Danis
27.text: Bex. She was with me in the grove. If she's not here then the curse...
27.context: NodeContext: frantic - horror dawning on him

70.speaker: Danis
70.text: I'm sorry, Bex. I'm so sorry.

44.speaker: Player
44.text: I met the other tieflings at Last Light Inn. Maybe she's there?
44.context: NodeContext: bex is alive - utter relief, grateful

45.speaker: Danis
45.text: They got away? They actually made it? Oh, thank the gods. She must be with the others - she must.
45.context: NodeContext: bex is alive - utter relief, grateful

50.speaker: Player
50.text: She's at Last Light Inn with the others - she's safe.
50.context: NodeContext: bex is alive - utter relief, grateful

37.speaker: Danis
37.text: She got away? Oh, thank the gods. Thank you. I was sure the curse...
37.context: NodeContext: bex is alive - utter relief, grateful

59.speaker: Danis
59.text: Look, tell her to go to Baldur's Gate. I'll... I'll meet her there.
59.context: NodeContext: you're epexting to die in this cell - you just want bex to run and get on with her life

52.speaker: Player
52.context: NodeContext: slow realisation that bex is dead

34.speaker: Player
34.text: I'm the only other tiefling here.
34.context: NodeContext: slow realisation that bex is dead

55.speaker: Danis
55.text: You mean she's not in Moonrise? Then the curse...
55.context: NodeContext: slow realisation that bex is dead

64.speaker: Player
64.context: NodeContext: bex is the love of your life - terrified she's hurt or worse

16.speaker: Danis

16.context: NodeContext: bex is the love of your life - terrified she's hurt or worse

94.speaker: Player
94.context: NodeContext: horror dawning on him - realising bex must be dead

81.speaker: Player
81.text: If she's not here, she must be dead.

71.speaker: Danis

28.speaker: Danis
28.text: The more you interrupt, the longer this will take.

36.speaker: Danis

39.speaker: Danis
39.text: I know you - you're from the grove.

46.speaker: Danis
46.text: Blessed gods - you were with the Absolute this whole time.
46.context: NodeContext: the love of your life is safe - utter relief, grateful

92.text: Shh. The other tieflings sent me - they're safe.
92.context: NodeContext: the love of your life is safe - utter relief, grateful

1.speaker: Danis
1.text: ...Bex is alive? Oh, thank the gods. Thank you.
1.context: NodeContext: the love of your life is safe - utter relief, grateful

35.speaker: Danis
35.text: When I woke up and she wasn't here I thought the worst.
35.context: NodeContext: rallying yourself - trying to be practical

5.speaker: Danis
5.text: We're dead if we don't get out of here. I can't believe Zevlor wanted us to go with these zealots.
5.context: NodeContext: rallying yourself - trying to be practical

66.speaker: Player
66.context: NodeContext: horror in his voice and he thinks about the attack

76.speaker: Danis
76.text: The cultists ambushed us out in the darkness. They butchered half of us - just to make a point.
76.context: NodeContext: horror in his voice and he thinks about the attack

83.speaker: Danis
83.text: A fight broke out, and... well, I'm glad Bex runs quicker than I do.
83.context: NodeContext: horror in his voice and he thinks about the attack

9.speaker: Danis
9.text: Zevlor wanted us to surrender - to these maniacs. A fight broke out, and... well, I'm glad Bex runs quicker than I do.
9.context: NodeContext: horror in his voice and he thinks about the attack

3.speaker: Danis
3.text: I haven't seen Zevlor since. Part of me wonders if he was with them all along.

89.speaker: Danis
89.text: Zevlor wanted us to surrender - to these maniacs. Last thing I remember is waking up in this place.
89.context: NodeContext: horror in his voice and he thinks about the attack

33.speaker: Danis
33.text: There was screaming - a fight broke out, I think. Last thing I remember is waking up in this place.
33.context: NodeContext: horror in his voice and he thinks about the attack

72.speaker: Player
72.text: How did you end up in here?
72.context: NodeContext: relief, gratitude - player is going to save his life

88.speaker: Player
88.text: Don't worry, I'm going to get you out of here.
88.context: NodeContext: relief, gratitude - player is going to save his life

47.speaker: Player
47.text: The gnomes have a plan to escape. We're going to get you out of here.
47.context: NodeContext: relief, gratitude - player is going to save his life

49.speaker: Danis
49.text: Thank you - a thousand times, thank you.
49.context: NodeContext: relief, gratitude - player is going to save his life

53.speaker: Danis
53.text: I've heard whispers from the gnomes - their cell is a few doors down. The sound of rock on rock too. If anyone can break us out, it's gnomes.
53.context: NodeContext: earnest - trying to do anything he can to help in the escape

30.speaker: Danis
30.text: Whatever the plan, I'll do it. Anything to leave this place.
30.context: NodeContext: earnest and scared - trying to do anything he can to help in the escape

56.speaker: Player
56.context: NodeContext: terrified - - moonrise is a chamber of horrors and he's trapped there

38.speaker: Danis
38.text: Please - there's no one else. They've been dragging us away, one by one. And the ones they take... they don't come back.
38.context: NodeContext: terrified - - moonrise is a chamber of horrors and he's trapped there

79.speaker: Danis
79.text: I'm next - I know it. Don't let him take me.
79.context: NodeContext: terrified - - moonrise is a chamber of horrors and he's trapped there

51.speaker: Player
51.text: I have better things to do. Get out of here your damn self.

60.speaker: Danis
60.text: ...I thought I could trust you. We all did.

57.speaker: Danis
57.text: But you're a traitor - probably been from the start. Get the hells away from me.

4.speaker: Danis
4.text: We're dead if we don't get out of here.

68.speaker: Player
68.text: Accuse me of being with the Absolute again, and I'll leave you here to die.
68.context: NodeContext: frantic - player threatened to walk off, calling them back

32.text: After the attack, I'm second-guessing everyone.

87.text: I'm not with the cult, I swear - I'm here to help.

84.context: NodeContext: relief - the player is on his side and not a traitor

65.text: Thank the gods - after Zevlor I'm second-guessing everyone.

69.text: You were lying this whole time, weren't you? Helped us out from under the heel of the druids so we could be slaves for your cult.
69.context: NodeContext: disgust - player has betrayed you and caused the death of people you love

86.speaker: Danis
86.text: You were lying this whole time, weren't you? Helped us out from under the heel of the druids so we could be slaves for your cult.
86.context: NodeContext: disgust - player has betrayed you and caused the death of people you love

19.speaker: Danis
19.text: Get the hells away from me!
